thread.title: Vols' loss to Alabama adds another close call to season
thread.title_full: Vols' loss to Alabama adds another close call to season

title: Vols' loss to Alabama adds another close call to season
text: Vols' loss to Alabama adds another close call to season Matt Slovin , mslovin@tennessean.com 7:26 p.m. CDT October 24, 2015 Tennessee coach Butch Jones walks off the field following the Vols' 19-14 loss to Alabama on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Alabama linebacker Reggie Ragland (19) hugs Tennessee running back Alvin Kamara (6), a former Alabama player, after the Crimson Tide won 19-14 on Oct. 24, 2015. Butch Dill, AP Alabama's A'Shawn Robinson (86) recovers a fumble caused by the sack of Tennessee quarterback Joshua Dobbs (11) by Ryan Anderson (22) late in the game on Oct. 24, 2015. Alabama won 19-14 Butch Dill, AP Alabama running back Derrick Henry (2) carries the ball in for the winning touchdown in the fourth quarter against Tennessee's Darrin Kirkland Jr. (34) on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Alabama wide receiver ArDarius Stewart (13) catches a pass as he comes down on top of Tennessee's Brian Randolph (37) and Justin Martin (8) on Oct. 24, 2015. Butch Dill, AP Alabama receiver ArDarius Stewart (13) pulls down a pass over Tennessee's Justin Martin (8) during the fourth quarter on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Tennessee running back Jalen Hurd (1) celebrates with tight end Alex Ellis (48) and wide receiver Josh Malone (3) after scoring a touchdown in the fourth quarter on Oct. 24, 2015. Butch Dill, AP Tennessee running back Jalen Hurd (1) carries the ball in for a touchdown during the fourth quarter on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Tennessee receiver Marquez North (8) carries the ball against Alabama's Cyrus Jones (5) on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Alabama's Reuben Foster (10), Denzel Devall (30) and Dalvin Tomlinson (54) wrap up Tennessee's Jalen Hurd (1) on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Alabama quarterback Jake Coker (14) is under pressure from Tennessee's Derek Barnett (9) on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Tennessee wide receiver Josh Smith (25) celebrates after catching a pass for a touchdown against Alabama on Oct. 24, 2015. Butch Dill, AP Alabama quarterback Jake Coker (14) stiffarms Tennessee's Derek Barnett (9) as he tries to get away from pressure on Oct. 24, 2015. Butch Dill, AP Tennessee's Brian Randolph (37) celebrates after intercepting a pass against Alabama on Oct. 24, 2015. Butch Dill, AP Tennessee running back Jalen Hurd (1) stiffarms Alabama's Reggie Ragland (19) on Oct. 24, 2015. Butch Dill, AP Alabama tight end O.J. Howard (88) breaks free from the tackle of Tennessee's Todd Kelly Jr. (6) on Oct. 24, 2015. Butch Dill, AP Tennessee's Jalen Hurd (1) is stopped by Alabama's Reuben Foster (10) and Cyrus Jones (5) on Oct. 24, 2015. Butch Dill, AP Tennessee Volunteers receiver Marquez North (8) ties to pull in a pass over Alabama defensive back Marlon Humphrey (26) on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Tennessee coach Butch Jones cheers on his team against Alabama during the first quarter on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Alabama running back Derrick Henry (2) celebrates his touchdown against Tennessee with tight end O.J. Howard (88) on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Alabama running back Derrick Henry (2) carries for a touchdown against Tennessee defensive back Malik Foreman (13) on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Alabama running back Derrick Henry (2) carries for a touchdown against Tennessee defensive back Malik Foreman (13) on Oct. 24, 2013. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Alabama tight end O.J. Howard (88) gets tripped up by Tennessee defensive back Cameron Sutton (7) on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Alabama quarterback Jake Coker (14) drops back to pass against Tennessee on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Tennessee's Alvin Kamara (6) carries the ball against Alabama's Ronnie Harrison (15) on Oct. 23, 2015. John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Tennessee's Joshua Dobbs (11) drops back to pass against Alabama on Oct. 24, 2015. John David Mercer, John David Mercer-USA TODAY Sports Tennessee coach Butch Jones, left, on the field with former Tennessee Volunteers and NFL quarterback Peyton Manning on Oct. 24, 2015.
